text:
Hi all! For those of you in the digital agency world, I would be extremely grateful if you’d take a few minutes to fill out Sprout Social’s 2021 Agency Pricing & Packaging Trends survey. We did this a couple years ago and it was hugely popular and helpful for agencies to see how others are successfully engaging, retaining and growing their clients. Those who participate in the survey will receive an advance copy of the report.

> *Fill out this 7 minute survey* to gain early, exclusive access to our Agency Pricing and Packaging Trends report, which aims to provide agencies with the trends and insights you need to guide your agency through 2021 planning and beyond.
> _Note: The data you choose to submit will be anonymized and aggregated for the report._
> <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Sprout-Agency-Report>

attachments.title: Agency Pricing and Packaging Trends Report
attachments.text: Take this survey powered by <http://surveymonkey.com|surveymonkey.com>. Create your own surveys for free.
attachments.fallback: Agency Pricing and Packaging Trends Report
